requirements.name: Sender Policy Framework (SPF) should be configured
requirements.description: SPF helps prevent spoofing and phishing by authenticating sending mail servers

requirements.name: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) should be enabled
requirements.description: DKIM adds a digital signature to emails for authentication

requirements.name: Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting, and Conformance (DMARC) should be configured
requirements.description: DMARC helps email receivers determine authenticity of emails

requirements.name: Mailbox auditing should be enabled
requirements.description: Enable auditing for all mailboxes to track access and changes

requirements.name: Mailbox retention policies should be configured
requirements.description: Configure retention policies to manage email lifecycle

requirements.name: Remote domains should be configured securely
requirements.description: Configure remote domains to control mail flow with external domains

requirements.name: Transport rules should filter potentially malicious content
requirements.description: Configure transport rules to block common phishing and malware indicators
